actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the Senate and the House of Representatives from Wednesday, April 3, or Thursday, April 4, 1985, until Monday, April 15, 1985.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the Senate and the House of Representatives from April 3 or 4 to April 15, 1985.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the Senate and the House of Representatives from Wednesday, April 3, or Thursday, April 4, 1985, until Monday, April 15, 1985.
